short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Netcompany SharePoint Toolkit in omnibox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the keyword 'tk' followed by a search query in the Omnibox in order to search for cases in a Netcompany (SharePoint based) Toolkit. If only one hit is found, you go directly to the case. Otherwise, a list (possibly of zero elements) of results is brought to you based on the search query. The list is ordered by the date of case creation.
